mapper.insert:
insert into client(clientName, userName, password,email,address,memo,phone1,phone2,phone3,contactPerson,website,token,dateJoined,logo) values (#{clientName},#{userName}, #{password},#{email},#{address},#{memo},#{phone1},#{phone2},#{phone3},#{contactPerson},#{website},123,'2013-11-11',#{logo})
select last_insert_id()
